name: Jelly Blast Legend
description:
This is a new Match 3 game created by Young Stars, the creator of "16 Squares" and "Jelly Pet Mania Legend" games!

Jelly Blaster Legend (Jelly Food Match 3) is a match-3 game, puzzle, and adventure, same many games on the world, example: Jelly Splash, Candy Crush,... It's a hit game that will have you making an explosion for hours on end. 
You will start your sweet journey to complete crushes deliciously and make sweet candy on jelly land.
Rules or gameplay is absolutely simple to suit everyone's taste. Just swap and match 3 or more same jelly blast to eliminate them, try to make more combos such as jelly paradise. It's simple, but once you play, you will find it very challenging.
****************************************************************************
How to play?
- Touch to swap 3 or more same elements to eliminate them
- Match 4 same candy on line to create a jelly blast
- Join jellies to create 2 lines with 3 same elements of each line at the same time, a jelly boom is created
- Smash 5 same soda candy on line to create a jelly clash bomb.
- Swap the jelly clash mania with any gem to make a super jelly dash, destroy all
- Breaking the obstacles quickly as possible to pass mission best score

Features
- FREE GAME and NO INTERNET.
- Currently the game has 600 levels. And more.
- Music and graphics in game are funny.
- Requests to earn fun rewards and daily reward.
- Keep progress game on server.
- Get diamond when complete each level.
- Share with friends.
- Exciting lighting effects while playing including blast mania, lighting splash, candy boom.
- Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master.
****************************************************************************************
Download Jelly Blaster Legend now to start your saga! Enjoy!
***************************************************************************
